stories.original_summary: Scientists have uncovered a surprising viral shortcut that turns moving cells into delivery vehicles for infection. stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Secret of Speedy Sickness Spread!
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has made a startling discovery about how sickness spreads. Instead of small, individual blights, infected creatures unknowingly create larger, shadowy bundles called 'Migrions.' These Migrions then quickly carry the illness directly to many new creatures, making the plague much faster.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Ear Jewels Block City Clamor, Keep You Alert!
stories.fantasy_story: The Tinkerers' Guild has crafted a wondrous new enchantment for ear jewels. These unique artifacts allow you to hear important sounds around you, like approaching wagons. Yet, they magically muffle the loud, bothersome clamor of bustling market streets, making travels through crowded towns much more pleasant.

stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Pedestal Turns Scrying Mirror into Wise Companion!
stories.fantasy_story: The Loona Clan has revealed a brilliant new enchanted pedestal. This magical stand not only recharges your scrying mirror's power but also awakens a tiny, helpful spirit within. The spirit can act as a wise guide and companion, answering questions and aiding your daily tasks from your desk.
